title: The Future of Fitness, with Misael Conteras
description: Misael Contreras joins the inaugural episode of The Bonus Show to discuss exercise tips and tools in a world without gyms.

title: Board of New Words, with Asia Yisrael and Ciara Pulliam
description: Asia Yisrael and Ciara Pulliam join forces to decide on the value – or lack thereof – of new slang words.
